s: If someone is going to go to the ... in CD format, then could we pleases do them the courtesy of keeping with a decent case? At least with the old fashioned ones, you could still by replacement cases if they broke. This trend is frankly pointless. Oh well. ... I had the cassette tape but who uses those. Got the CD. Brought me back to 1990 when it came out on my Senior week after graduation! Love Faith No More...

t: The Platinum Collection: Amazon.co.uk: CDs & Vinyl
Amazon.com: Album Of The Year: CDs & Vinyl
s: I've had the CD since it came out and saw their final full tour supporting this album. It's Faith No More, so throw your preconceptions out the window. I think this would've been an excellent follow up to Angel Dust, it hops genres, rocks out, and has some really beautiful moments.
